Settings

Information

Ex Nihilo is a generative soundscape composed and synthesized entirely through custom software. Unlike traditional soundscape recording practices, the software generates an imagined, evolving ecosystem using entirely algorithmically synthesized sounds of fauna and natural elements.

Developed in 2024. Audio generation is done through RNBO by Cycling '74. Visuals are generated through a combination of Javascript and p5.js

This work was originally developed for my undergraduate capstone project. If you would like to read the essay that accompanied the original project it can be viewed here.
